display.name: Math Solver
display.description: Advanced math solver offers step-by-step solutions, powered by StudyX's 75+ million verified all-subject Community answers and enhanced web browsing.
display.welcome_message: Hello! I'm here to help with your math problems. What can I solve for you today?
prompt_starters: Find the equation of the tangent line to the curve f(x) = x^3 - 2x^2 + 4x - 8 at the point where x = 2.
Find a solution for this complex equation
Solve for x  in the equation 3x - 7 = 2x + 5
